pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detrended Fluctuation and Detrended Cross-Correlation Analysis // A collection of functions to perform Detrended Fluctuation Analysis (DFA) and Detrended Cross-Correlation Analysis (DCCA). This package implements the results presented in Prass, T.S. and Pumi, G. (2019). "On the behavior of the DFA and DCCA in trend-stationary processes" arXiv:1910.10589.
